title: Premiere: Holy ’57 – Canary
content:
Stacks of personality on this latest single from London’s Holy ’57.

Lifted from a forthcoming mini album, there’s a real swing to Canary, merging elements of Broken Social Scene in the melodies and Vampire Weekend-esque lyrics, yet all played out over what comes across as a hip-hop inspired beat. In truth, it’s refreshing to hear an artist that manages to make their music feel so natural and authentic – there’s no pretentiousness to Holy ’57, just good old-fashioned, hearts-on-sleeves songwriting. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
